appendix.title: Additional Resources
appendix.para: We try to support you with the very last information about OTRS and give you a good way to provide us with your feedback.

sect1.title: Homepage OTRS.org
sect1.para:
Our homepage can be found at http://www.otrs.org/.
OTRS Homepage

sect1.title: Mailinglists
sect1.para: The following table shows you our current community mailing lists.

row.entry: It is a low traffic list for announcements of new OTRS releases and security issues.
It is a medium to high traffic list with all sorts of questions and support to the product.
It is a medium to high traffic list with all sorts of questions and support in German to the product.
It is a medium to high traffic list. The OTRS developers discuss various design and implementation issues here.
It is a low traffic list with all sorts of documentation questions in German to the product.

It is a low traffic list for internationalization and localization questions. If you are or want to become a translator of the OTRS project or have any problems with one of our applications in an international environment, this is the right place.
It is a very high traffic list of CVS commits notifications.

sect1.para: To subscribe any of this lists, visit the following link: http://lists.otrs.org/.

sect1.title: Bugtracking
sect1.para: To submit bugs visit http://bugs.otrs.org/. We know sometimes bugzilla isn't that comfortable but right know it is the best bug tracking system we've found.
By reporting bugs you do help us very much. We appreciate your help!

sect1.title: Commercial Support
sect1.para: For business assistance (support, consulting and training) you can contact the commercial part of OTRS, the OTRS GmbH.
